name: Call Each New Year
storyline: The opportunity for the older generation to return to the days of student life. Furious action, sparkling humor - all this is closely related to the complexity of the old games. Will you risk immersing yourself in a world full of difficult choices? Can you get through the night? Can you reach the end and find out what horrors an ordinary holiday hides in itself?
summary: Call Each New Year is a crazy party simulator game. Everyone's favorite holiday will appear in a new light. See how you would spend the new year based on the election.
